document_data.caption: A map showing the location of the Muradi Lighthouse.
document_data.name: Muradi Lighthouse
document_data.mainbody: The '''Muradi Lighthouse''' was a lighthouse standing at the very southwestern tip of the [[Koryo Peninsula]] in [[Koryo]] in the 14th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1308 DR]], [[Bosturo]] came to be the Master of the Muradi Lighthouse. With dedicated service, he had held this position for 49 years by 1357 DR. At one point, he received a scroll of commendation from the ex-[[king of Silla]], and displayed it proudly in his studio.
document_data.Services:
Atop the lighthouse was a huge oil lamp. Its purpose was to warn of [[the flaming seas]] that lay off the coast to the south.

The lighthouse keeper, Bosturo, was also a noted scholar on the flora and fauna of Koryo, and gave his advice for a fee or a conversation.
